sections.heading: Foster parents and kinship foster care parents; rights8-530
sections.text: Foster parents and kinship foster care parents; rightsA. A foster parent or kinship foster care parent in this state has the following rights:1. To be treated with consideration and respect for the foster parent or kinship foster care paren
